scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --workspaces --no-git-tag-version && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --workspaces --no-git-tag-version && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version
scripts.version:major: npm version major --workspaces --no-git-tag-version && npm version major --no-git-tag-version
scripts.docker:build: docker build --build-arg VERSION=$npm_package_version --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ") --build-arg VCS_REF=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) -t wifsimster/the-box:latest -t wifsimster/the-box:$npm_package_version .
scripts.docker:tag: docker tag wifsimster/the-box:$npm_package_version wifsimster/the-box:$(echo $npm_package_version | cut -d. -f1-2) && docker tag wifsimster/the-box:$npm_package_version wifsimster/the-box:$(echo $npm_package_version | cut -d. -f1)
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:tag && npm run docker:push
